strings:
<voice_0x01000C44><se_def>Marcello: ...Ah! There you are!
I trust you slept well.

<voice_0x01000C45><se_def>Marcello: King Trode has explained everything.
I apologise for having doubted you.

<voice_0x01000C46><se_def>Marcello: Dhoulmagus is the true culprit.
In the name of the Goddess, we must strike down that diabolical jester!

<voice_0x01000C47><se_def>Marcello: But I cannot leave here now.
As the new Abbot, I have much to do.
I must be here to guide my people.

<voice_0x01000C49><se_def>Marcello: According to what King Trode tells me,
you are all pursuing Dhoulmagus.
<voice_0x01000C4A><se_def>Marcello: So I have a proposal. I would like my brother Angelo to accompany you on your quest.
<voice_0x01000C4B><se_def>Angelo: Brother? I thought you said you wouldn't have a rule-breaker as a brother...
<voice_0x01000C4C><se_def>Marcello: Quiet! I wasn't talking to you!

<voice_0x01000C4D><se_def>Marcello: Angelo. You are the only one we can spare
at the moment.

<voice_0x01000C4F><se_def>Marcello: Everyone else here has duties to fulfil.
Only you are without such responsibilities.

<voice_0x01000C50><se_def>Angelo: ...I'm useless, you mean!
No need to beat about the bush.

<voice_0x01000C52><se_def>Angelo: You've made yourself perfectly clear.
I will leave the abbey.
I will travel with these people.
And I will avenge the Abbot's murder.
<voice_0x01000C53><se_low>King Trode: I'll be waiting by the carriage with Medea, then...

<voice_0x01000C54><se_def>Marcello: Very well then!
I entrust Angelo to your care,
and wish you well on your journey.
<Cap><leader> receives <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_1> and puts <IF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>them<ELSE_NOT_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>it<ENDIF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1> in the bag.
